Thank you for attending!

SAVE THE DATE:

MAY 14-16, 2024

Supplier Showcase: May 13 • Indianapolis, Indiana

The Sweets & Snacks Expo is a can’t-miss event for thousands of confectionery and snack retailers, manufacturers and suppliers for a reason – here you’ll find all the product innovations, insights and industry connections you need to build a world-class in-store or online experience that will delight your shoppers.

NOTIFY ME

When 2024 Registration Opens

Take a look at the future of the Sweets & Snacks Expo! The show has announced the locations and dates of the next decade of the Sweets & Snacks Expo, so mark your calendars and prepare to join us for 10 more years of innovation, insights and connection. Learn more.

SWEETS

Hundreds of the world’s leading candymakers debut new products at the Sweets & Snacks Expo, with exhibitors ranging from global players to up-and-coming innovators new to the confectionery industry. Find the specialty, gourmet, organic or classic candies your shoppers are searching for in one centralized location and connect directly with the people behind them.

SNACKS

The latest innovation in chips, nuts, sweet snacks, jerky, pretzels and more can be found in the aisles of the Sweets & Snack Expo, with new flavors and formats galore. With something for every snack shopper, the Sweets & Snacks Expo hosts classic snack favorites alongside groundbreaking new snack products. Don’t miss all the snack innovation and real industry connections happening each day on the show floor.

START EXPLORING

ACTIONABLE INSPIRATION

It’s About More Than New Products.

Inspiration at the Sweets & Snacks Expo goes beyond exciting new product debuts. The show brings together leading industry experts to offer big-picture insights that help attendees predict shopper trends and stay one step ahead of their competition.

FIND OUT HOW

MEANINGFUL CONNECTIONS

It’s About More Than “Just Business.”

With thousands of confectionery and snack professionals in attendance, the Sweets & Snacks Expo offers unparalleled industry connections and opportunities for partnership. What’s more, all Sweets & Snacks Expo attendees are vetted to ensure they are truly members of the confectionery and snack industries looking to do business at the show.

START CONNECTING

CUTTING-EDGE INNOVATION

It’s About More Than Having The Right Assortment.

New products make their debut at the Sweets & Snacks Expo, making the show the birthplace of countless industry-shaping trends and rising consumer favorites sure to delight any shopper. But don’t worry: the Sweets & Snacks Expo’s Most Innovative New Product Awards make it easy to find the standouts amongst the hundreds of products making their debut at the show.

GET EXCITED

Welcome to Indianapolis!

Start your engines! Indianapolis is so much more than the Indy 500 – explore everything this beautiful and historic city has to offer and lock in your hotel room for a week of candy, snacks and fun.

LEARN MORE

We're on the move.

SAVOR THE EXPERIENCE

Our future looks bright in Indianapolis. This vibrant city will add a fresh new flavor to the world’s premier candy and snacks event. You won’t just experience the industry’s hottest innovations and coolest trends, but you can also sample the surprising treats that Indy has to offer.

JOIN US FOR THE RIDE TO INDY
